column1: Instant bank payment. Free. No registration.
column2: "Ħlas bankarju immedjat. Mingħajr ħlas. L-ebda reġistrazzjoni."

column1: Instant online banking payment. Supports all banks. Free of charge. Use your regular bank login.
column2: "Ħlas bankarju onlajn immedjat. Jappoġġja l-banek maltin kollha. Mingħajr ħlas.  Uża l-login regolari tal-bank tiegħek."
